title: House for sale in Akuregoda Battaramulla
details:
3 story house situated at Akuregoda – Lake Road
Good Neighborhood & Calm & quite area

500 mtrs to main road
40 feet more road frontage

* Ground Floor –
One bed room with attached bath room, large living area, Dining area, Pantry, servant room

* 1st r Floor –
3 bed room with attached bath room & entertainment room,TV lobby

* 2nd Floor – Roof Top

All rooms with Fully AC and modern bath showers & fully tiled,
Pantry with pine wood and granite top

CCTV Camera, overhead water tank, a sump and solar hot water system, & 3 phase electricity, High roof, Thick concrete slabs & Thick walls

Price Rs. 30 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351, DUPLICATION ROAD, (next to Mahanama College)
COLOMBO 03
